text: Aldis Alexander Basil Hodge (born September 20, 1986) is an American actor. He is known for playing Alec Hardison on Leverage, MC Ren in the 2015 biopic Straight Outta Compton, Levi Jackson in the 2016 movie Hidden Figures, and as Noah on Underground. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from North Carolina
title: Aldis Hodge
